on reading compounds: 蔓延【マンエン】spread (e.g. of a disease), rampancy, infestation, proliferation, being widespread
蔓脚類【マンキャクルイ】Cirripedia, barnacles
kun reading compounds: 蔓延る【はびこる】to become overgrown, to grow thick, to spread, to run rampant, to thrive, to prevail, to become powerful
蔓【つる】vine, bine, tendril, runner, bow, temple arm, sidepiece, lug arm, earpiece, part of a pair of glasses that goes over the ear, connections, contacts, influence, financial supporter
